location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns a petition, made on behalf of Buxee Khanum, widow of Aga Mahomed Bebany (spelled Babony and Bebanee elsewhere in the volume) regarding her claim to her late husband's estate. Includes a copy of the petition, which is dated 15 January 1812, and is addressed to George Brown, Governor in Council, Bombay.
